discussion.author: rafaqz
discussion.text:
This is not a widely known acronym.

See point 1 here (and point 4) :
https://pkgdocs.julialang.org/v1/creating-packages/#Package-naming-guidelines

discussion.author: goerz
discussion.text: `GeneralizedEstimatingEquations` seems like a doable package name. Maybe a tiny bit long, but definitely ok.

discussion.author: goerz
discussion.text: Ah, never mind, I see you already renamed to `EstimatingEquationsRegression`, which is also fine.

discussion.author: kshedden
discussion.text: This can be closed, I renamed and the new package is here: https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/General/pull/84478
